name: U.F.O (SIsilicon)
description:
Hello! Thank you for showing interest in this game by coming here. So this game is not your ordinary infinite runner. You tap on the screen to make little pulses in space. You must use them to push your the U.F.O across space. Last as long as you can while. while avoiding any perils. Watch out for asteroids, and be wary when swinging by stars!

There's also some powerups you can use to help. From a laser gun to a shooting star that grants invincibility!

This game is currently in its beta stage. More features will be implemented later on.
